summary: An Ordinance amending Ordinance No. 20720 of the City of Seattle, entitled "An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller and ex-officio City Clerk of the City of Seattle, in behalf of the City, to enter into a contract with The Seattle Electric Company whereby, for valuable consideration to be paid by The City Electric Company, the city will grade for use of The Electric Company a twenty (20) foot roadbed upon and along the portion of East Green Lake Boulevard, which is between North Fiftieth Street and North Seventy-seventh Street", approved the 21st day of April, 1909.
